code: import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import React,{useState}from'react';import logo from'../img/logo.png';import speechbubble from'../img/speechbubble.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Nav(){const[showMessage,setShowMessage]=useState(false);const handleMouseOver=()=>{setShowMessage(true);};const handleMouseOut=()=>{setShowMessage(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onMouseOver:handleMouseOver,onMouseOut:handleMouseOut,className:"logo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"logo-img",alt:"JD Logo"}),showMessage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"message",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"speechbubble",src:speechbubble}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"bubble-text",children:"Hi there"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"logo",children:"Julia Dearden"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/",className:"nav-item",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/projects",className:"nav-item",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/resume",className:"nav-item",children:"Resume"})]})]});}export default Nav;
